AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. REPAYMENT SCHEDULE EACH TRANCHE TO BE REPAID IN FULL AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM THE RESPECTIVE FDRS CREATION DATE. 13. CONTRACTUAL COMFORT IRREVOCABLE AND UNCONDITIONAL PERSONAL GUARANTEE FROM: 1. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. REPAYMENT SCHEDULE EACH TRANCHE TO BE REPAID IN FULL AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM THE RESPECTIVE FDRS CREATION DATE. 13. CONTRACTUAL COMFORT IRREVOCABLE AND UNCONDITIONAL PERSONAL GUARANTEE FROM: 1. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12. AVAILABILITY THE FACILITY WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR DRAW DOWN FROM THE PERIOD DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL BUT NOT AFTER 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF ACCEPTANCE OF CAL. AMOUNTS REMAINING UNDRAWN AT THE END OF THE AVAILABILITY PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY CANCELLED. 11. DRAWDOWN DRAWDOWN IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS PRECEDENT BEING SATISFIED. THE BORROWER HAS THE FLEXIBILITY TO AVAIL MULTIPLE TRANCHES WITHIN THE TOTAL STL AMOUNT. THE BORROWER MUST GIVE AT LEAST 1 BUSINESS DAY PRIOR WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE LENDER BEFORE EVERY DRAW DOWN FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE. THE BORROWER SHOULD CREDIT THE SAME AMOUNT OF DRAW DOWN IN THE DESIGNATED ACCOUNT ON THE NOTICE DATE. THE LENDER WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT IN THE SAME DESIGNATED ACCOUNT FOR CREATION OF FDRS IN FAVOR OF EXCHANGE, I.E. BORROWER WILL DEPOSIT MONEY IN A DESIGNATED ACCOUNT. THE BANK WILL DISBURSE EQUIVALENT AMOUNT BUT NOT EXCEEDING THE SANCTION LIMIT TO CREATE AN FDR. THE FDRS MAY BE A SINGLE FOR OR MULTIPLE FDRS. IN CASE THE BORROWER DECIDES TO MAKE FDR FOR PERIOD GREATER THAN 365 DAYS, THEN THE BORROWER TO DEPOSIT AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO ICICI BANK SHARE AT THE END OF 365 DAYS FROM RESPECTIVE DRAWDOWN DATE. 12.
